relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Inspection reveals a ~6 inch transverse lower abdominal scar and a small scar below the umbilicus; abdomen is soft and non-distended; bowel sounds present; tenderness to palpation in the right lower quadrant; no rebound tenderness or guarding; positive Rovsing's sign, obturator sign; negative psoas sign; no palpable masses or hepatosplenomegaly.
relevant_findings.DRE: Normal tone, no gross or occult blood.
